# go-multiplex

A super simple stream muxing library compatible with [multiplex](http://github.com/maxogden/multiplex)

## Usage

```go
mplex := multiplex.NewMultiplex(mysocket)

s, _ := mplex.NewStream()
s.Write([]byte("Hello World!")
s.Close()

os, _ := mplex.Accept()
// echo back everything received
io.Copy(os, os)
```
